page.title: 06 Changes in Silverton
page.content:
In Silverton a number of changes have occurred. Shops have changed and different houses have been built. Estates have been added and Silverton has been modernized.
The first estate to be built was for the Council in the late fifties, followed by the private developments of Silverdale and Applemead in the sixties. The Health Centre and the new Silverton School were built in the seventies, together with the housing development around Wyndham Road. The most recent phase has been the Wimpey estate of Hederman Close. Since then, the only development has been infilling with individual houses, and the building of a car park and toilets at the back of the Health Centre.
